alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 16 at 7:59PM EDT until May 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM EDT WEDNESDAY FOR THE BERKSHIRES AND NORTHWESTERN CONNECTICUT... The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a Red Flag Warning for the Berkshires and northwestern Connecticut which is in effect from 8 AM to 8 PM EDT Wednesday. * Affected Area...The Berkshires and Litchfield County. * Timing...8 AM to 8 PM EDT Wednesday. * Winds...Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 20 to 25 percent. * Temperatures...In the 50s to lower 60s. * Lightning...None. * Impacts...Dry conditions and gusty winds may result in rapid fire spread if ignition occurs.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
